backend/main.mo: Defines core backend logic for users, conversations, messages, calls, and friendships with authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, linked frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the Inter font and mounting the React application at root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper handling onboarding, actor initialization, chat UI, and global call components.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Exports the app name and tagline used across the UI.
frontend/src/constants/buildInfo.ts: Provides a build identifier based on an environment variable or document timestamp.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginView.tsx: Deprecated login UI screen showing branding but no longer used in the app flow.
frontend/src/features/auth/NameStartView: Initial onboarding screen where users enter and save a display name before entering the app.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallChip.tsx: Renders a minimized call UI chip with peer info and mute/end controls, updating call status on the server when ending.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallProvider: Provides global call state and actions such as starting, receiving, minimizing, muting, and ending calls, including peer connection management.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallScreen.t: Implements the full call screen, handling local media, WebRTC setup, signaling, call initiation, and remote stream handling.
frontend/src/features/calls/IncomingCall: Displays a modal dialog for incoming calls with caller info and accept/decline actions.
Polls for incoming calls, shows dialogs, and sets up WebRTC and backend updates when calls are accepted or declined.
frontend/src/features/calls/useCallSigna: Polls backend call sessions for status, offer, and answer updates, invoking callbacks when changes occur.
frontend/src/features/calls/useIncomingC: Polls the backend for pending incoming calls and returns the list along with related metadata.
frontend/src/features/calls/useLocalMedi: React hook to acquire and manage local audio/video media streams with error handling and cleanup logic.
frontend/src/features/calls/webrtc.ts: Utility functions for creating RTCPeerConnections, generating offers/answers, handling ICE, and managing local/remote streams.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatShell.tsx: Main chat layout managing conversation selection, new chat dialog, and rendering the conversation list and message thread.
frontend/src/features/chat/ConversationL: Displays the user’s conversations with unread status, user lookup, and delete actions using backend query hooks.
frontend/src/features/chat/MessageCompos: Message input component supporting text, image upload with preview and progress, and sending messages via backend mutation.
frontend/src/features/chat/MessageThread: Renders messages for a conversation, marks them as read, auto-scrolls, and provides call initiation actions.
frontend/src/features/chat/NewChatDialog: Dialog component for searching users and starting new conversations with error handling and search filtering.
frontend/src/features/chat/time.ts: Utility functions to format message timestamps into relative or readable time strings.
frontend/src/features/chat/useMessagePol: Custom hook that periodically invalidates message and conversation queries for live updates.
frontend/src/features/profile/AppInfoHel: Dialog showing the current app URL, copy-to-clipboard, and cache-busting reload options.
frontend/src/features/profile/ChangeDisp: Dialog that updates the user's display name using a mutation and refreshes related queries.
frontend/src/features/profile/DisplayNam: Onboarding screen prompting new users to register a display name and create their profile.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileMen: User profile dropdown providing access to display name changes and app info dialogs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalActor.ts: Creates a backend actor using a locally generated identity and initializes access control via a secret token.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for conversations, messages, user search, user lookup, and mutations like sending messages or starting conversations.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables with OKLCH colors and layout adjustments including dark mode.
frontend/src/lib/localIdentity.ts: Handles generation, serialization, storage, and retrieval of a local Ed25519 identity in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/localProfile.ts: Manages localStorage state for display names and onboarding completion flags.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH-based color palette, themes, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state for a chat app, listing existing features, known issues, and pending feature requests. Highlights chat-start failures, auto-scroll improvements, and story/privacy additions.
